scripts.setup: pnpm i && cd frontend && pnpm i && cd ../backend && uv sync
scripts.dev:back: cd backend && wait-on http://localhost:5173 && DEV=1 uv run index.py
scripts.dev: concurrently -k -n FRONTEND,BACKEND -c blue,green 'pnpm run dev:front' 'pnpm run dev:back'
scripts.build:linux: pnpm run build:front && backend/.venv/bin/pyinstaller linux.spec --distpath dist/bin --clean --noconfirm
